author: Alexander Mallin
title: Law enforcement warns Americans of increasing coronavirus scams
description: Law enforcement officials are seeing increasing efforts by scammers looking to take advantage of the coronavirus pandemic to prey on U.S. consumers.
content:
Law enforcement officials are seeing increased efforts by scammers looking to take advantage of the novel coronavirus pandemic to prey on U.S. consumers, according to the FBI and other agencies.
